data.title: Mickey Mouse films
data.meta_description: For a complete and much more detailed analysis of Mickey Mouse’s films see my book ‘Mickey’s Movies: The Theatrical Films of Mickey Mouse’ (2018). 1928 1. Plane Crazy 2. Gal…
data.text:
For a complete and much more detailed analysis of Mickey Mouse’s films see my book ‘Mickey’s Movies: The Theatrical Films of Mickey Mouse‘ (2018).
